channel.title: Yangming Li's Blog
channel.description: AI/ML, Product and Engineering insights by Yangming Li

item.title: Docker in Machine Learning: Ensuring Reproducibility and Seamless Deployment
item.description: A comprehensive guide to using Docker for ML/DS projects - from environment setup to reproducible experiments and production deployment pipelines.

item.title: MLOps Essential Skills: Streamlining ML Workflows
item.description: Master MLOps principles and implementation with practical examples using MLflow and Weights & Biases for efficient model lifecycle management and automated deployments.

item.title: The Essence of a Successful Product: Insights for Product Managers
item.description: A deep dive into what truly makes a product successful from a product manager's perspective - balancing user needs, business goals, and technical constraints.

item.title: Decoder-Only Architecture Dominance in Modern LLMs
item.description: Why decoder-only architectures have become the standard in LLMs - technical analysis of efficiency, training dynamics, and architectural advantages over encoder-decoder approaches.

item.title: Understanding Kubernetes: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: A deep dive into Kubernetes architecture, components, and practical implementation for container orchestration at scale with hands-on examples.
